Title: CEO
Text: When placing counters on any single Ticket, place +1 counter.

Title: CTO
Text: When placing counters on a single TECH Ticket, place +2 counters.

Title: Office Manager
Text: Draw 2 cards instead of 1 at upkeep, then put one of them on top or the bottom of the Player Deck.
Notes: Define upkeep strictly in the rules, it should only point to drawing a card from the Player Deck at the beginning of a turn.

Title: Lead SWE
Text:
üÖ∞Ô∏è: Discard 2 cards and do Refactoring.

üÖ∞Ô∏è: Discard 3 cards and do Heavy Refactoring.

Title: Generalist
Text: When placing counter, place +1 counter for every 2 Markets currently featured in the Product.

Title: Manager
Text: You decide the order of card actions on your turn.
Notes: Need to determine the canonic effect resolution order.
